title.rendered: BOUQUET OF FLOWERS FOR A SPECIAL OCCASION

content.rendered:
Bouquet of Flowers for a Special Occasion

There’s nothing more heart warming than receiving a bouquet of flowers for a special occasion. So, how do you choose the perfect arrangement to celebrate the loved ones in your life? 

Here at LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio, we adore being a part of your special occasions and our talented, creative florists work with the seasons to create designer arrangements to suit any style and event. Our contemporary approach pays homage to the latest emerging trends from Europe, combined with floristry inspiration from Sydney and Melbourne and our own artistic flair. Our arrangements showcase the best in minimalist design to bring out the natural beauty of our seasonal, perfumed, textured florals and foliages for bouquets that really leave an impression. We offer same day delivery throughout the Gold Coast, Hinterland, and Tweed Coast areas on all orders placed before 11am so your bouquet of flowers for a special occasion are sure to be delivered on time and with care by our specialty floral couriers. 

We hand select the best available florals and foliages from local flower markets and growers on the day to ensure your bouquets are fresh and long lasting. We choose to support Australian flower farmers and growers wherever possible, so when you order from us you can trust that you’re contributing to small Australian business with a transparent supply chain. 

When deciding on a bouquet of flowers for a special occasion, there are a number of factors to take into consideration, and a high quality florist should be able to address each of these with you to bring your floral vision to life. We take you through some of the main considerations for choosing a bouquet of flowers for a special occasion in this blog, but if you’re feeling overwhelmed, remember that we offer a ‘Leave It To Us’ option on every product where our highly experienced florists can take the lead and create something stunning just for you! We aim to make the process of ordering a bouquet of flowers for a special occasion as customisable or as simple as possible to deliver the best customer experience and the most beautiful seasonal floral designs. 

Choosing a Bouquet Style 

For your next bouquet of flowers for a special occasion, LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio is proud to offer a stunning range of contemporary styles to suit your needs. Whichever option you choose, each individual bouquet is uniquely designed and styled by us to showcase the best seasonal florals available on the day. We also offer a range of sizes and price points in each bouquet style: Petite, Standard, Generous, Lush and Lux. 

Our Designer Posies are one of our most popular options and are a shorter style posy presented in our signature wrap and ribbon or arranged in a simplistic, contemporary glass vase to suit their style and shape. 

Our Designer Bouquets are a contemporary clustered style arrangement full of seasonal, perfumed, textured florals and foliages. Designer Bouquets are delivered wrapped with water and accented with our signature rose gold ribbon or in a minimalistic glass vase. 

Our Designer Vase Arrangements are presented in our signature contemporary glass vase with a luxury rose gold ribbon and are a modern clustered style of fresh seasonal florals and foliages for your next special occasion. The inclusion of a vase ensures that your bouquet is ready to display as soon as it’s received, perfect for delivering to the office or other event location. 

Our Fresh Florals For Home is a more organic arrangement, a simplistic market style wrap of fresh cut seasonal, perfumed, textured florals and foliages selected by us as the very best of the day. These are ideal to give to the more creative types and can be cut and arranged into their own vase, grouped in individual varieties around the home or displayed as is for a natural aesthetic. 

Our En Masse bouquets are ideal for maximum impact, this modern style features all one variety of seasonal florals with no additional foliage included. These minimalist designs create a stunning effect in any space and really allows one floral variety to take centre stage, perfect for Peonies and other feature florals.

Choosing Your Colour Scheme 

When selecting your bouquet of flowers for a special occasion, we offer a variety of colour schemes. Being a beauty of the natural world, florals are of course seasonal in nature, but due to our beautiful Australian climate, we do have a beautiful range of florals and foliages available all year around and will always do our best to accommodate any requests.

Or, just leave it to us and we’ll use the very best florals and foliages available on the day to create your bouquet of flowers for a special occasion. No two bouquets are ever the same, and our florists delight in designing the perfect arrangement for you in our contemporary, luxury style. 

Choosing Your Florals 

Because we hand pick the best seasonally available florals and foliages from local flower markets and growers each day,  we always have a beautiful and in season range available to use in your bouquet of flowers for a special occasion. However, we know that sometimes a particular floral will be calling out to you or have a special significance for another reason. In these cases, we will always do our very best to source the variety you’re looking for or, if they are out of season, we’ll work with you to find a substitute that has a similar stunning effect. 

We love designing your floral arrangements, so don’t hesitate to and let us know what’s on your heart so we can help to make your floral dreams come true. 

Optional Add On Gifts 

When ordering your bouquet of flowers for a special occasion, it can be a thoughtful touch to your gift to include something from our range of artisan, Australian-made products. Our gift selection has been carefully curated to complement our luxury floral designs and support other Australian businesses. We are proud to offer add-on gifts with any of our arrangements for that extra special touch and a simple, cohesive gifting experience for you. Choose from: 

Melbourne-made Myles Gray candles and diffusers. Myles Gray is a family owned business who proudly hand pour all of their candles, which are topped with ethically sourced intentional crystals. These pieces are created with a little magic in every one, and each vessel and crystal is cleansed before making its way to you. Available in four beautiful scents across both the candle and diffuser range, these are difficult to pass up. Choose from Watermelon for Friendship, Freesia and Berries for Balance, Coconut and Clarity for Clarity, Bulgarian Rose  for Healing and Coconut, Pineapple and Vanilla to bring Light to your space. 

Decadent twin-packs of Loco Love chocolates from just over the hills in Byron Bay. With delicious flavours complemented by all natural organic ingredients and adaptogenic herbs, these fair-trade pockets of deliciousness are truly gorgeous from the inside out! Choose from Dark Peppermint Creme, Butter Caramel Pecan, Wild Rose Ganache, Hazelnut Praline or Peanut Butter Caramel. If you can choose that is, why not try all the flavours? 

Norton + Norton clay vessels are inspired by natural landscapes and are designed and handmade especially for us here at LULLY & ROSE, so you won’t find the same ones anywhere else and no two are quite the same. These clay vessels come standard with the Designer Floral Bowl arrangement, but if you would like to combine one of these with one of our other styles, please let us know and we’ll be happy to accommodate wherever possible. 

Last but not least, nothing says ‘luxe’ quite like receiving a designer floral arrangement with a bottle of bubbly! Support local with a Tasmanian Sparkling White Wine or go full luxury with an exquisite French Champagne. 

The Florists Behind LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio  

When ordering your next bouquet of flowers for a special occasion, you’ll receive nothing short of the best from Rachael and Andy of LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio. With over 14 years of combined florist industry experience as qualified floral designers, these two women were destined to open a luxury floral studio and are inspired every day by the natural beauty of flowers. Their unique, seasonal designs are a reflection of this passion. Rach and Andy both have fond memories of spending their childhood among the perfumed floral gardens of their respective Grandmothers, after whom the studio is named, and have recreated this feeling of beauty and wonder in their floral studio. When you work with LULLY & ROSE, each arrangement is individually created and tended to with care for a gift that is thoughtful, stylish and on trend. 

Located centrally on the Gold Coast, LULLY & ROSE is a haven of seasonal, textured, perfumed florals and foliages. LULLY & ROSE is your go to florist for stunning floral designs created with heart and delivered throughout the Gold Coast, Hinterland and Northern NSW regions. 

Add a touch of luxury to every occasion with LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio.
